room_title: Escape room "Revenge" by Escape Code in Branson
review: We have been to several escape rooms all over the country and have never been defeated until now... Revenge did us in! But it was a lot of fun and very well done! If you are a novice, start with their easier rooms and if you are an expert, good luck with this one!

room_title: Escape room "Revenge" by Escape Code in Branson
review: The experience was awesome! Very friendly staff. Would definitely go back and do another escape room!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Revenge" by Escape Code in Branson
review: Escape Code was awesome! We did Revenge which was very challenging! We didn't finish but were so close.. lol. Made me want to try again!

room_title: Escape room "Revenge" by Escape Code in Branson
review: Went with the family today! We did the Revenge room, and it was a fantastic experience. They accommodated our large group for one room, even though the room was technically for six players. It was very much appreciated. The employees were great, friendly, and I loved the atmosphere.

room_title: Escape room "Revenge" by Escape Code in Branson
review: We had a wonderful experience last night at Escape Code! It was our first time doing an escape room and we were not disappointed. We played in the Revenge room. Our room guide, Evan, was helpful, funny, and very encouraging! Even though we did not escape, he definitely made us feel like we did a great job. Overall and awesome experience and we will be back!
